Rmd to annotate the 6 DEGs when comparing day 2 ABC to GHI crabs. 
Crabs A, B, and C --> infected ambient (7/8˚C)
Crabs G, H, and I --> infected elevated (10˚C)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

Read in list of 6 DEGs: (.txt version where I fixed columns)
```{r}
degs <- read.delim()

```
